p: The transmission electron microscopy (TEM) image in the light field (BF) of the carbon-coated SiO 2 composites with 0.005 M sucrose solution ( Figure 5a) shows a large agglomeration of nanoparticles covered by a nanostructured carbon film. The high magnification image ( Figure 5b) reveals a thin film consisting of carbon nanostructures, which exhibit ordered arrangement on short distances. The main elements in the area highlighted by the square in the image in Figure 5a are carbon, silicon, and oxygen (EDAX spectrumâ€”not presented).
